message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 simply doesn't cover my costs. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price that allows us both to benefit from the deal.
